docs.lead_paragraph: A man accused of attacking a mannequin that Las Vegas police positioned to resemble a homeless person following two slayings remained jailed Friday.

headline.main: Man Arrested After Attack on Homeless Person 'Decoy'
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested After Attack on Homeless Person 'Decoy'

docs.lead_paragraph: Grammy-winning artist Chance the Rapper used a Friday sit-down with Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner to press for immediate funding for cash-strapped Chicago Public Schools, but said he left "flustered" over "vague answers."

headline.main: Chance the Rapper, Illinois Governor Discuss School Funding
headline.print_headline: Chance the Rapper, Illinois Governor Discuss School Funding

docs.snippet: Grammy-winning artist Chance the Rapper used a Friday sit-down with Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner to press for immediate funding for cash-strapped Chicago Public Schools, but said he left "flustered" over "vague answers."...

docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Rex Tillerson has agreed in principle to a White House proposal to slash foreign aid and diplomatic spending by 37 percent, but wants to spread it out over three years rather than in one dramatic cut.

headline.main: Officials: Tillerson Eyes State Dept Budget Cut Over 3 Years
headline.print_headline: Officials: Tillerson Eyes State Dept Budget Cut Over 3 Years

docs.snippet: Secretary of State Rex Tillerson has agreed in principle to a White House proposal to slash foreign aid and diplomatic spending by 37 percent, but wants to spread it out over three years rather than in one dramatic cut....

docs.lead_paragraph: The chancellor of the SUNY system says the governor’s scholarship plan has vast potential.

docs.lead_paragraph: Repairs to a major bridge that links Pennsylvania and New Jersey are ahead of schedule and on track for the span over the Delaware River to reopen in about a month, engineers said Friday.

headline.main: Bridge Closed by Fractured Truss on Track to Reopen in April
headline.print_headline: Bridge Closed by Fractured Truss on Track to Reopen in April

docs.snippet: Repairs to a major bridge that links Pennsylvania and New Jersey are ahead of schedule and on track for the span over the Delaware River to reopen in about a month, engineers said Friday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt's interior ministry said on Friday its forces killed four people it said were fugitive terrorists plotting to carry out hostile operations.

headline.main: Egyptian Police Kill Four in Shootout in Cairo Outskirts
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Police Kill Four in Shootout in Cairo Outskirts

docs.snippet: Egypt's interior ministry said on Friday its forces killed four people it said were fugitive terrorists plotting to carry out hostile operations....

docs.lead_paragraph: Arnold Schwarzenegger said on Friday he will not be back for another season of NBC's reality show "The Celebrity Apprentice," blaming U.S. President Donald Trump's ongoing role as executive producer for low ratings.

headline.main: Schwarzenegger Quits 'Celebrity Apprentice' Over Show's Trump Ties
headline.print_headline: Schwarzenegger Quits 'Celebrity Apprentice' Over Show's Trump Ties

docs.snippet: Arnold Schwarzenegger said on Friday he will not be back for another season of NBC's reality show "The Celebrity Apprentice," blaming U.S. President Donald Trump's ongoing role as executive producer for low ratings....

docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Pozzi put years of injury woes behind him to  clinch the 60 metres hurdles gold medal at the European indoor athletics championships on Friday and claim his first international title.

headline.main: Athletics: Briton Pozzi Powers to Sprint Hurdles Gold
headline.print_headline: Athletics: Briton Pozzi Powers to Sprint Hurdles Gold

docs.snippet: Britain's Andy Pozzi put years of injury woes behind him to  clinch the 60 metres hurdles gold medal at the European indoor athletics championships on Friday and claim his first international title....
